page.title: 06Horses of Winteringham Farm
page.content: The centre usually has about twenty two horses, but the number varies from week to week.{Cheyenne}was the first horse we saw.{Cheyenne}is a skewbald who is 15 hands high,and is one of the centre's own horses.{Ben}is another horse like{Cheyenne}because he is light brown and white.He is blind in one eye, but is still ridden regularly because he can see very well with the other one.Two horses called {Queenie}and {Lucinda }are relations of the {Queen's}Cleveland bay stallion.{ {Queenie}is 16.1 hands high and {Lucinda},the proprietress's own horse, is 15.3 hands high.{Mister}who is 17 years old is a strawberry roan pony and is 14.1 hands.{Dusty}who is a grey pony had a cough, so he could only be ridden for half an hour a day.
